communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

An electronic copy of the bodycam footage regarding the Tara Katherine Wright incident that occurred on July 22, 2024 at 1209 Demoiselle St, Groveland, FL 34736.
Specifically, I am seeking to obtain electronic copies of the:

1. BWC footage recorded by Groveland PD's responding officer, Officer Zimmel detailing his full involvement in this incident

To assist you in locating the footage here are the key details of the incident:
Date of Event: July 22, 2024
Names: Tara Katherine Wright
Location of Event: 1209 Demoiselle St, Groveland, FL 34736

Please let me know if you require further information to process it.

If any aspects of this request are denied, please cite each specific exemption you feel justifies the refusal to release the information and please notify me of the appeal procedures available to me under the law.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

John Johnson

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

An electronic copy of the bodycam footage regarding the Omauriyah Armstrong incident that occurred on May 28, 2024 at around 5:30 p.m. at S Schuyler Ave, Kankakee, IL 60901.

Specifically, I am seeking to obtain electronic copies of the:

1. BWC footage recorded by Kankakee Police Department's responding officers (main arresting officer and assisting officer) detailing their full involvement in this incident

To assist you in locating the footage here are the key details of the incident:
Date of Event: May 28, 2024
Names: Omauriyah Armstrong
Location of Event: S Schuyler Ave, Kankakee, IL 60901

Please let me know if you require further information to process it.

If any aspects of this request are denied, please cite each specific exemption you feel justifies the refusal to release the information and please notify me of the appeal procedures available to me under the law.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

John Johnson
